content.text:
Concord Hotel

Jewish singles weekend
sit us Down at table with ugly girls & I told
them Don't you have any Pretty ones

We get in Room Jack says Don't touch my
hair, you Dump water Right on his head
then we set Room on fire.

throwing food in Dining Room, No one would
serve us - so they Put us By Kitchen

Gave us all our Money Back & told us to
Leave & Never come Back

text_sections.full_transcription:
Concord Hotel

Jewish singles weekend
sit us Down at table with ugly girls & I told
them Don't you have any Pretty ones

We get in Room Jack says Don't touch my
hair, you Dump water Right on his head
then we set Room on fire.

throwing food in Dining Room, No one would
serve us - so they Put us By Kitchen

Gave us all our Money Back & told us to
Leave & Never come Back

organizations.name: Concord Hotel
organizations.context: Famous Catskills resort in New York

insights: Story about Jewish singles weekend at Concord Hotel
Concord Hotel was famous Catskills resort (Borscht Belt)
Dumped water on Jack's head after hair comment
Claims to have set room on fire
Relegated to kitchen area seating as punishment
Hotel refunded money and banned them
Story appears to be humorous/exaggerated memory
Jewish singles weekends were common at Catskills resorts
Behavior described would result in criminal charges

expert_notes: Different handwriting from other pages examined

forensic_notes: Paper appears to be standard white paper
investigative_leads: Identity of Jack mentioned in story
Date of Jewish singles weekend event
